alert.note: Alert for Dickey; La Moure; McIntosh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN LAMOURE, DICKEY AND MCINTOSH COUNTIES THROUGH 215 PM CDT... At 143 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were producing funnel clouds and occasional landspouts along a line extending from 11 miles west of Lisbon to 6 miles west of Fullerton to near Zeeland. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts to 40 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fullerton around 200 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Ellendale and Venturia. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
